body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-go/compare/master...versioning-ga/tq-propagation-status

**Additional context**
Now that SetCurrentVersion and SetRampingVersion return success before propagation of routing config is complete, users may want visibility into the status so they can wait before starting workflows, or write reliable tests
title: Versioning GA: Expose RoutingConfigUpdateState in VersionInfo
